about_the_game:
3 Minutes to Midnight Original Soundtrack

Immerse yourself in the world of 3 Minutes to Midnight through our award-winning soundtrack, a carefully crafted musical journey that heightens every moment of the game.




Two Volumes, One Epic Journey

Spanning two volumes with 30 tracks each, the soundtrack offers over 3 hours of music. From intense, adrenaline-pumping sequences to calm, reflective moments, every track is crafted specifically for 3 Minutes to Midnight, bringing the game’s world to life.

Crafted by Talented Composers

This soundtrack features the work of talented composers, including Guy Jones, Laia Serra, Nicolás Roses, Lluís Crespí, and Sebastian López. Each composer has added their unique touch to create a dynamic and immersive soundscape.

Brought to You by Scarecrow Studio

Produced and published by Scarecrow Studio, this soundtrack is a testament to their commitment to delivering high-quality, original music. Every note is crafted with care, ensuring that the soundtrack resonates with players long after the game is over.

Pure Human Creativity

This soundtrack is 100% human-made, with every piece composed specifically for the game. No AI involved—just pure creativity from start to finish.
